    index="my-index-000001",
    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "analyzer": {
                "en": {
                    "tokenizer": "standard",
                    "filter": [
                        "my_shingle_filter"
                    ]
                }

                "my_shingle_filter": {
                    "type": "shingle",
                    "min_shingle_size": 2,
                    "max_shingle_size": 5,
                    "output_unigrams": False
